title: Lib Dem candidate apologises for saying 'stopping Brexit is like fighting the Nazis'
text:
The Liberal Democrats are under pressure to sack a would-be MP who claimed Brexit caused rise in domestic abuse and trying to stop it is like fighting Nazi Germany.

David Chalmers, who is attempting to unseat the Attorney General, posted on Facebook that “divisions that have split families and friends have led to huge rises in violent crime on our streets and domestic abuse in our homes”.

In another social media post he compared the fight to stop Brexit like defeating the Nazis.

"We knew and are beginning to feel how badly leaving the EU is going to impact on this country and especially areas like Devon and Cornwall,” he wrote.

“So we have to stop this - just as we stopped the Nazis in Germany...
description: The Liberal Democrats are under pressure to sack a would-be MP who claimed Brexit caused rise in domestic abuse and trying to stop it is like fighting Nazi Germany.
